name: OBE'S RUN
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Click the screen to jump and see how long you can survive.

Simple quick game where the whole aim is to get the highest score by jumping from platform to platform with a few surprises thrown in.  

Designed to work on a round watch screen but does still look good on mobile. Have tested the game and it works really well on the Huawei Watch 3.
